summary: This bill, the Restoring Names of American Greatness Act of 2025 (H.R. 4533), introduced in the House of Representatives on July 17, 2025, aims to codify Executive Order 14172. The bill's stated purpose is to give the force of law to Section 2 of Executive Order 14172, which is titled 'Restoring Names That Honor American Greatness'. The bill's short title is the Restoring Names of American Greatness Act of 2025.
